job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltugtSite ReliabilityampnbspEngineerltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtExcellent opportunity to be part of this high growth business unit transforming on premise applications to Google Cloud PlatformampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtYou will work with a dedicated team to design configure deploy and support enterprise applications to GCP in a large data intensive environmentampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtRESPONSIBILITIESltstronggtampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtWork with business and IT team to transform enterprise applications from on prem to GCPltligtltligtDesign configure deploy and triage applications into productionltligtltligtCode deployment utilizing terraformltligtltligtCICDampnbspltligtltligtWrite scripts performance monitoringltligtltligtSupport and on call dutiesampnbspltligtltligtDocument new processesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis is an excellent 6 month contract opportunity working withampnbspa high growth business unit as they transform to GCP Outstanding opportunity to learn and grow your skills in a team that is seeking innovation in product and technology Potential for conversion to full time employment Ideally in Saint Louis or Atlanta but you can work 100 remotelyampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtREQUIRED SKILLSltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt5 years as an SRE  Site Reliability EngineerampnbspltligtltligtGCP  1 year  experience deploying code to cloud platformsltligtltligtExperience deployingsupporting NetC applicationsampnbspltligtltligtWindowsampnbspand related scripting skills in PowerShell Python or BashltligtltligtKnowledge of CICD Jenkins pipelinesltligtltligtExcellent troubleshooting skills and a problemsolver mindsetltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtPREFERRED SKILLSltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtKubernetes  certificationsampnbspltligtltligtGKEampnbspltligtltligtAppDynamicsampnbspampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgt
